body: Wellp this is the last opportunity to make one so ask away
body_tagged: Wellp this is the last opportunity to make one so ask away
title: Last AMA

replies.body:
Opinions?
can you ask me something on my AMA?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?
can you ask me something on my AMA?

replies.body: Sheesh all these people wanting opinions
replies.body_tagged: Sheesh all these people wanting opinions

replies.body: Nice guy, really good builder. We have known each other for a while I think since the mars and jala days so yeah
replies.body_tagged: Nice guy, really good builder. We have known each other for a while I think since the mars and jala days so yeah

replies.body: Im really disappointed that you didn't go to the owl cafe... tisk tisk...
replies.body_tagged: Im really disappointed that you didn't go to the owl cafe... tisk tisk...

replies.body:
We have been friends for like 3 years now... Anyway a lot has happened in those 3 years and I really look foward to playing OW with you on my mac ;)

also crested geckos are better. They just are.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: You are a nice guy, and seem to be nice to everyone. Sometimes you can be a bit annoying but thats the case with just about anyone xd
replies.body_tagged: You are a nice guy, and seem to be nice to everyone. Sometimes you can be a bit annoying but thats the case with just about anyone xd

replies.body:
You are a nice guy, but sometimes you tryhard too much. You brag about having more ranks than me, and that you have mentor, but at the end of the day things like that don't really matter. Especially now... Also how did you get builder if you just built your first map

Yes
